keyMoments.title: Return Koala to Her Hometown
keyMoments.description: The Sun Pirates successfully complete their mission to return former slave Koala to her family on Foolshout Island.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's compassion and commitment to helping freed slaves, though it leads to tragedy.

keyMoments.title: Battle with Marines at Foolshout Island
keyMoments.description: The Sun Pirates fight desperately against a Marine fleet led by Rear Admiral Strawberry to rescue their captain Fisher Tiger.
keyMoments.significance: Despite their efforts, they cannot save Tiger from his mortal wounds.

keyMoments.title: Loss of Captain Fisher Tiger
keyMoments.description: The Sun Pirates lose their beloved captain and founder Fisher Tiger to blood loss after he refuses a human blood transfusion.
keyMoments.significance: Tiger's death fundamentally changes the crew's direction and leads to their eventual split in the next episode.

formation.description: Founded by Fisher Tiger after his escape from Mary Geoise and liberation of slaves

jollyRoger: A sun symbol representing liberation and freedom
goals: Maintain Fisher Tiger's legacy of liberation
